Description:
This is a large spacious light and airy house, set back 100m from the beach, only 5 minutes walk to the famous Rock surf break and Ahangama beach (Which has surf schools for beginners and intermediates).
It is located in a quiet and safe area, away from the main road. It has sea views from the top floor bedrooms through coconut palms. 
The villa is owned and managed by a welcoming trustworthy Sri Lankan family who speak good English and will make your stay special and authentic.
The villa has a large safe garden area, ideal for children. The villa is tastefully furnished reminiscent of a Colonial style home, with 4 poster beds, hard wood antique furniture and high beamed ceilings and cane dining furniture.
The large open spacious dining/social area is available to use at any time, french doors lead from all rooms to balconies. With the option to dine outside on the large balcony/terrace. Delicious, wholesome Sri Lankan and Western food available.
There is also a small kitchen for guest use if they so wish. Wifi is fast and included.
It is only a 5 minute ride in a tuk tuk to Ahangama (where there is a railway station). Buses are a 5 minute walk on the main road. Offering Sri Lankan foods, spa and wellness centre in Kabalana Design House Villa is located just a 5-minute walk from the Rock surf break and Kabalana beach. Free WiFi access is available.

Each tastefully furnished room here will provide you with a hot water, seating area and mini fridge. There is a kitchenette with an oven and a big refrigerator. Featuring a shower, bathroom comes with a hairdryer. You can enjoy sea and garden view from the balcony.

At Kabalana Design House Villa you will find a fitness centre. Other facilities offered at the property include a nightclub, grocery deliveries and water sports facilities and surfing lessons too. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling, fishing and diving. The property offers free parking.

Packed lunches can be requested. Room service is available. The UNESCO World Heritage Site of Galle Fort is a 30-minute train ride or any other transport method. Scooters also can get for rent.

Description:
Located in Ahangama, a few steps from Kabalana Beach, Mellow Hostel Sri Lanka provides accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The guest house has a terrace and city views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar.

Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a fridge, an oven, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. The guest house offers certain rooms with sea views, and each room includes a patio. At Mellow Hostel Sri Lanka each room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a continental or American breakfast.

You can play table tennis at Mellow Hostel Sri Lanka.

Kathaluwa West Beach is less than 1 km from the guest house, while Koggala Beach Park is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Koggala, 5 km from Mellow Hostel Sri Lanka, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

The villa features 1 separate bedroom and includes a kitchen with an oven, toaster and dining area. The villa also provides a bathroom with a bidet.

Wide range of activities are available in this area, such as snorkeling, windsurfing, whale watching, snake park, tea estates, ancient temples, boat trips, scuba diving, cycling and ayurvedic massage.

The property is only 100 metres away from Midigama main surf point 5 km away from Weligama surf point and 10 minutes to Kabalana where you can experience some of best surf breaks on the island. Mirissa and Unawatuna beaches are only a few km away.

Set in Weligama, 200 metres from Midigama Beach, New Ocean Vibes offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Featuring room service, this property also provides guests with a childrens playground. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property.

All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries, while selected rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also have city views. The units feature a safety deposit box.

Description:
Located in the up and coming coastal town of Midigama on Sri Lankas southern coast, Lime & Co Midi is a surfers paradise. This charming hotel is located right opposite the beach within close distance to at least 5 well known surf breaks.

Our eco friendly lodging is minimalist in design and largely open to make the most of the wonderful sea breeze. With its earthy lime washed walls and large windows, all 13 bedrooms remain cool and airy (without the need for Air conditioning) even during the height of a hot summers day!
